author: john lea
comment: Had the standard one for a while and liked it,so I upgraded. But a bit disappointed with the customising options, would like to change the colour on the hour and min mark's. Also be able to brighten them, and maybe change the shapes and colours. But still happy with the purchase.

author: kirk watstien
comment: Would like to see more user options more colors to play with etc also i cannot change my weather color it goes to the color wheel i pick but it still stays white must be a bug?
title: Hands need to be brighter and a watch battery sub dial would be a killer add in imo

author: Gary Parizek
comment: Work alright on the moto 360 but doesn't work on the hauwie watch as near as I can tell all of the features don't work.
title: Nice

author: Jared Leith
comment: If I had more option's I would rate higher.

reply.content: What options do you want? Please send a email to jaralhelp@gmail.com

title: Needs more customisation option's.

author: Jeff W
comment: Nice concept but poor execution. Uninstalled for refund.
title: Slow and Buggy

author: Chris Feehan
comment: Parallax view is garbage, just floats the top layer and just mskes it look off.
title: Crap
